0.text: Innate: Vladimir gains (2.5% bonus health) as  ability power and (140% AP) as  bonus health. These two bonuses do not stack with each other.
Active: Vladimir drains blood from the target enemy, dealing them magic damage and  healing himself.

1.text: Each cast of Transfusion generates a stack of  Bloodthirst over its  cooldown, which is displayed in his secondary resource bar. At 2 stacks, Vladimir gains  10% bonus movement speed for 0.5 seconds, and Crimson Rush while the  Bloodthirst depletes over 2.5 seconds. The  Bloodthirst depletes 75% slower during  Tides of Blood,  Sanguine Pool or  stasis.

2.text: Crimson Rush: The next cast of Transfusion deals  85% increased damage and heals for an additional 30 − 200 (based on level) (+ 5% (+ 4% per 100 AP) missing health), reduced to 35% against  minions, consuming all  Bloodthirst.

0.text: Active: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, gaining  37.5% bonus movement speed which decays exponentially over 1 second and becoming  untargetable and  ghosted for 2 seconds.

1.text: Enemies inside the pool are  slowed by 40% and dealt magic damage every 0.5 seconds over the duration. Vladimir  heals himself for 15% of the pre-mitigation damage dealt by Sanguine Pool.

2.text: Vladimir cannot use basic attacks or abilities during Sanguine Pool, but is still able to move. If  Tides of Blood is charging at the time of Sanguine Pool's activation, that ability may still be recast.

flatPartType: % BASED ON CHARGE TIME MAXIMUM HEALTH

4.origin: COST: 2 / 4 / 6 / 8% (BASED ON CHARGE TIME) MAXIMUM HEALTH

0.text: Active: Vladimir  charges for up to 1.5 seconds,  slowing himself by 20% if he charges for more than 1 second. Tides of Blood can be recast at any time within its duration. If Vladimir finishes charging or is  interrupted, he automatically initiates the recast.

1.text: Recast: Vladimir unleashes a nova of 15 blood bolts, each of which collide with the first enemy they hit, dealing them magic damage that is increased based on how long Tides of Blood was charged, up to the first second.

2.text: If Tides of Blood was charged for at least 1 second, enemies hit are also  slowed for 0.5 seconds.

3.text: Enemies can intercept multiple bolts, but may only be damaged once.

4.text: If Vladimir is below 12% of his maximum health Tides of Blood will not cost any health, but will still increase in damage.

0.text: Active: Vladimir spreads a virulent plague at the target location, infecting all enemies within the area at the time of cast for 4 seconds, which increases the damage they take from all sources by 10% for the duration.

1.text: After the duration, the infection bursts, dealing magic damage to all infected targets and bringing the blood from all infected enemy  champions to Vladimir over 0.4 seconds for him to harvest,  healing him, reduced by 50% for each subsequent champion.

1.concerningText: Active: Vladimir drains blood from the target enemy, dealing them magic damage and  healing himself.

0.concerningText: Active: Vladimir drains blood from the target enemy, dealing them magic damage and  healing himself.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Supersonic: Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while moving towards nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
active.originText:
UNIQUE – SUPERSONIC:  Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while moving towards nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
